service.desc: Find current and upcoming weather from your local region or around the globe!

service.name: News Channel
service.desc: Get up to date information on recent worldwide events right on your Wii thanks to the News Channel!

service.name: Check Mii Out Channel
service.desc: Create and show off your Miis in a variety of contests in which you will make Mii look alikes!

service.name: Everybody Votes
service.desc: Vote on different polls regarding very varied topics, then predict the results! Let the party of democracy begin!

service.name: Food Channel
service.desc: Order various types of food directly to your home via your Wii, and pay on delivery!

service.name: TV Guide Channel
service.desc: Check your local TV programming guide, find shows that interest you and control your TV with your Wii Remote!

service.name: Kirby TV Channel
service.desc: Watch episodes of the Kirby: Right Back at Ya! anime on this channel previously only available in Europe!

service.name: Photo Prints Channel
service.desc: Create albums and business cards with photos from your SD card or with your Mii characters!

service.name: Wii Room
service.desc: Re-enter the Wii Room, Nintendo's closed Japanese video-on-demand and shopping service!
